items.name: Sweet
items.description: A lumpy orange friend who is yummy when fried.

items.name: Yam
items.description: Often confused with the sweet potato. Who knows why?

items.name: Russett
items.description: Brown outside and white within. Bland friend of Idahoans.

items.name: Golden
items.description: Yellowish smooth friend, especially in the mosh pit.

items.name: Red
items.description: Awesome friend who really shines with butter and parsley.

items.name: Blue
items.description: Who the hell needs a blue friend?
